name: Rabine
description:
Rabine is a world class provider of innovative solutions for local and national property asset managers. We go far beyond surfacing a parking lot, laying a roof or snow removal. We are built on an unrivaled engineering foundation, creating meaningful advantage for you: the highest quality work - on time and in budget—planned and executed to maximize long term return on investment. 

Rabine services commercial, industrial, and utility customers that are local, regional, and national. Rabine encompasses multiple companies across industries dedicated to quality products and services for pavement and construction needs. Rabine companies include Rabine Paving, Rabine Paving Texas, Rabine Paving Mid-Atlantic, Rabine America, Pipe View America, Rabine Snow Pros, Rabine Mechanical, Rabine Doors & Docks, Crawford Roofing Experts, Rabine America Maintenance, and SITE.
 
Each Rabine company is guided by passionate team members. Our team strives to be the best in the industry by leveraging global networking and state of the art training. Our world-class team, above all else, is dedicated to providing the highest quality products and services to provide total customer satisfaction.

Crain’s Chicago Business recognizes Rabine as one of the largest privately held organizations, and as one of the “Fastest Fifty” growing companies in the Chicagoland area.
 
Rabine staff and their families are a charitably minded team and proudly participate in activities supported by the Rabine Foundation and TrueMentors, two non profit organizations started by Cheryl and Gary Rabine. The Rabine Foundation has a mission to support causes on behalf of children, elderly, disadvantaged, medical research, and veterans. TrueMentors is a mentorship network where high level leaders are matched with mentees seeking shared experiences to enhance their leadership growth.

Rabine.com
enriched_summary: Rabine Group is a national exterior facilities management company that offers paving, roofing, snow removal, property assessments, and more. They have over 39 years of experience and are valued partners with some of the country’s largest brands. They pride themselves on quick turn-arounds, minimal disruption, and reliable, quality service.
metadata_title: Rabine Group, A National Exterior Facilities Management Company - Rabine Group

locations_full.location_address: 900 National Parkway; Suite 260; Schaumburg, IL 60173, US

updates.description: Rabine Paving Mid-Atlantic recently performed a successful job for a large, national freight company at their location in Huber Heights, OH. Our customer was very happy with the completed paving work! Shout out to Dave Lusk, RPMA Project Manager, for navigating this very large project. #rabinepavingmidatlantic #rabinepavesohio #asphaltpaving #paveandstripe

We’ve performed work in all 50 states	🚧 ⚡

Rabine America specializes in asphalt and concrete parking lots nationwide,

https://rabineamerica.com

	

Asphalt Pavement

 Vertical Construction Expansions
 
 Parking Lot Maintenance

 Crack Sealing
 
 Patching & Infrared Patching
 
 Decorative Pavements
 
 Storm Water Management
 
 Excavation
 
 Scopes & Site Assessments

Safety first always! Rabine Paving puts safety at the forefront not only by wearing the proper PPE and directing pedestrian traffic, but also by leading with a safety mindset in every situation.
The Rabine Team holds a safety briefing prior to starting a project at a BNSF railroad yard in St. Louis, Missouri. Like us, BNSF holds itself and partners to a high standard of safety. #safetyfirst

Our awesome team at Rabine Paving Texas recently performed a sealcoat, joint seal and concrete patch project at a large distribution center in Fort Smith, Arkansas. #rabinepavingtexas #sealcoating #jointseal
Rabine Paving Texas just finished Phase 1 of a project in Dallas, Texas that included a new ADA ramp and sidewalk. #rabinepavingtexas #concretepaving

Rabine Snow Pros attended the 28th Annual SIMA (Snow & Ice Symposium) in Grand Rapids Michigan, June 17-20. This event had over 130 exhibitors and included networking opportunities and educational classes. Thank you to our amazing team members Dave Singleton and Julie Biggott for representing Rabine! #rabineatsima #rabinesnowpros #sima2025

Rabine proudly sponsored 2 holes at the BOMA/Suburban 2025 golf outing at Cantigny Golf Course in Wheaton, IL. At this year’s event, there were 300 BOMA real estate members in attendance! The Rabine team was represented by Dave Singleton, Dana Elia, Marilou Salinas & Bill Shanko. #boma2025 #rabinesponsor

National Construction Safety Week recognizes the dedicated, hardworking men and women in the industry who are instrumental in the development of our infrastructure and facilities. It highlights the vital role that safety plays in the growth of a nation and well-being of its people. #rabinesafety #safetyfirst #safetyisnumberone

Melissa Carnrite, Director of Enterprise Accounts, for Rabine, alongside Brennen Ward and Kyle Miller, knocked it out of the park last week when they hosted a successful client Lunch and Learn for their clients at Corporate headquarters.

Rabine Paving Mid-Atlantic hosted a First Aid Training Event March 11 at the RPMA main office in Maryland. The class was 4 hours in length and team members received training and certifications on CPR, First Aid, and Stop the Bleed. Shout out to RPMA employees in attendance, Herman Arndt, Josue Dimas, Irenia Barbosa, Salvador Palmer, Scott Donaldson, Carlos Baruca, and Johnathan Perez.
Rabine appreciates the women in construction that make what we do possible. Including these three all-stars from our estimating team. #womeninconstructionweek

Rabine Mechanical is looking for a trained and qualified commercial HVAC Field Supervisor and HVAC Technician. Visit www.rabinemechanical.com to learn more about our company. Please send resumes to nicolebluemke@rabine.com
